characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If a Great Unclean One with a doomsday bell attempts to summon a unit of NURGLE DAEMONS to the battlefield using a Daemonic Ritual you can roll 4 dice instead of 3 for this summoning roll. In addition, at the start of each of your turns, you may roll a D6 for each NURGLE DAEMON unit within 7" of any friendly Great Unclean Ones with a doomsday bell; on a 4+ a single slain model is returned to that unit.
